title: Meet 8 Youth Protest Leaders
text:
Their cities are running out of water. Droughts are driving their friends off their farms. Mosquitoes are showing up in places where they had never seen them. The future of the planet seems so uncertain that they confess to being afraid and anxious.

From Melbourne to La Paz, London to Cape Town, young people are mobilizing for a historic day of protests on Friday to goad world leaders into addressing what they call the climate crisis. Rallies are expected to be held in more than 150 countries, including in every state in the United States.

Who are these young protest organizers? What is driving them? What do they want?
description: Around the globe, young people are demanding action on climate change in a day of protest. Meet eight of the local leaders.
